医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究模拟了世卫组织为中低收入国家妇女提出的宫颈癌筛查策略的优点、危害和可负担性人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 的七种初级筛查算法的危害、益处和可负担性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-models-advantages-harms-and-affordability-of-WHO-profused-cervical-cancer-screening-strategies-for-women-in-LMICs。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-models-advantages-harms-and-affordability-of-WHO-profused-cervical-cancer-screening-strategies-for-women-in-LMICs。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46c6320e-c030-47a4-999d-a5def442fca8 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 05:07:00 -0500 Study models advantages, harms, and affordability of WHO proposed cervical cancer screening strategies for women in LMICs
基因代理 PDE5 抑制与生育力、性行为和健康指标的关联研究人员进行了两个样本的孟德尔随机化分析，以调查 PDE5 的基因代理抑制之间的关联，PDE5 是勃起功能障碍、生育能力、主观健康和性行为的公认药理学目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Association-of-genically-proxied-PDE5-inhibition-with-measures-of-fertility- Sex-behavior-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Association-of-genically-proxied-PDE5-inhibition-with-measures-of-fertility- Sex-behavior-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fc4ac0f-1124-428c-a080-e58345f60fc6 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 04:21:00 -0500 Association of genetically proxied PDE5 inhibition with measures of fertility, sexual behavior, and wellbeing
可乐治愈？研究揭示苏打水在常见假日医疗紧急情况下的潜力研究人员进行了一项随机对照试验（RCT），以评估可乐缓解食道餐团嵌塞的安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Cola-cure-Study-sheds-light-on-sodas-pottial-for-common-holiday-medical-emergency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Cola-cure-Study-sheds-light-on-sodas-pottial-for-common-holiday-medical-emergency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e4a0305-f332-4889-b83e-361bf7f93562 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 03:42:00 -0500 Cola cure? Study sheds light on soda's potential for common holiday medical emergency
自大流行以来，英格兰吸烟率的下降逐渐停止伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，自疫情爆发以来，英国吸烟率长达数十年的下降趋势几乎停止了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Englands-decline-in-smoking-grinds-to-a-halt-since-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Englands-decline-in-smoking-grinds-to-a-halt-since-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74fe87e3-cede-43e2-99e8-7b49a30f25d1 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:55:45 -0500 England's decline in smoking grinds to a halt since the pandemic
研究表明新生儿蛋白质与成人健康之间的相关性昆士兰大学 John McGrath 教授领导的研究发现，C4 蛋白（免疫系统的重要组成部分）的浓度与精神障碍风险无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Research-shows-correlation- Between-neonatal- Proteins-and-adult-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Research-shows-correlation- Between-neonatal- Proteins-and-adult-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59ed9ced-e304-4973-8d7b-7044df23c596 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:47:39 -0500 Research shows correlation between neonatal proteins and adult health
11 岁时对身体不满意可能会增加 14 岁时患抑郁症的风险伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新纵向研究发现，11 岁时对身体的不满与 14 岁时患抑郁症的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Body-dissatisfaction-at-age-11-may-increase-depression-risk-by-age-14.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Body-dissatisfaction-at-age-11-may-increase-depression-risk-by-age-14.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fc21049-61da-4394-b5af-2af5e73b202a Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:28:38 -0500 Body dissatisfaction at age 11 may increase depression risk by age 14
研究显示持续的新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 症状会导致美国家庭陷入经济困境研究表明，持续的 COVID-19 症状和严重感染严重影响了美国家庭的经济状况，低收入家庭更容易陷入经济困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-shows- permanent-COVID-19-symptoms-lead-to-economic-struggles-for-US-families.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-shows- permanent-COVID-19-symptoms-lead-to-economic-struggles-for-US-families.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3375c3f-97d9-4256-bae4-dc6cd9e9b307 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:24:00 -0500 Study shows lasting COVID-19 symptoms lead to economic struggles for US families
研究表明，高胰岛素反应可以成为您的健康盟友西奈健康中心的研究人员发现了有关餐后胰岛素水平与长期心脏和代谢健康之间关系的重要信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/High-insulin-response-can-be-your-health-ally-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/High-insulin-response-can-be-your-health-ally-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22af8666-b3b7-4b75-986e-b559c85854e4 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:15:57 -0500 High insulin response can be your health ally, study says
受孕前父亲饮酒会对胎儿发育产生负面影响德克萨斯农工大学的研究人员已经表明，父亲在受孕前的饮酒习惯会对胎儿发育产生负面影响；经常饮酒的男性的精液会影响胎盘发育、胎儿酒精综合症（FAS）相关的大脑和面部缺陷，甚至体外受精的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Paternal-alcohol-conspiration-prior-to-conception-can-have-a-male-effect-on-fetal-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Paternal-alcohol-conspiration-prior-to-conception-can-have-a-negative-effect-on-fetal-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0564dd96-c7e6-4836-9fbb-90eed44f74ed Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:02:02 -0500 Paternal alcohol consumption prior to conception can have a negative effect on fetal development
基于互动屏幕的活动影响青少年的睡眠健康虽然人们普遍知道屏幕时间会影响睡眠，但新的研究表明，互动参与（例如给朋友发短信或玩视频游戏）比被动屏幕时间（例如看电视）更能延迟和减少睡眠时间；特别是对于青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Interactive-screen-based-activities-impact-sleep-health-of-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Interactive-screen-based-activities-impact-sleep-health-of-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f13ad7a-fee5-411f-a0e5-f85ed3d40bb6 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 22:56:20 -0500 Interactive screen-based activities impact sleep health of adolescents
